definition: Din Tai Fung, restaurant specializing in dumplings, with stores in many countries
ancient cooking cauldron with two looped handles and three or four legs/pot (dialect)/to enter upon a period of (classical)/Kangxi radical 206/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes
Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand
luxuriant/buxom/variant of 豐|丰[feng1]/variant of 風|风[feng1]/appearance/charm

sentences.english: These dumplings come courtesy of a Taiwanese restaurant chain called Din Tai Fung No matter.
sentences.chinese: 现在经手的是台湾一家名叫鼎泰丰的连锁店。

sentences.english: This is the story of how the DinTaiFung legend came to be.
sentences.chinese: 鼎泰丰的传奇是这样开始的。

definition: Haidilao (aka Hai Di Lao), hot pot restaurant chain founded in Sichuan in 1994
shop, firm, or brand of merchandise with a long-established reputation
Japanese cuisine (abbr. for 日本料理[Ri4 ben3 liao4 li3])
afternoon tea (light afternoon meal, typically pastries with tea or coffee)
shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒麥|烧麦[shao1 mai4]
